standard.name: Facility has defined & established procedure for Community Participation for providing assured services
Facility has procedure for collecting & Reporting of the health facility related information
The facility has defined procedures for registration and consultation of patients.
Facility provides National Health Programmes as per operational/clinical guidelines of the Government
Facility has defined procedure for primary management and continuity of care with appropriate maintenance of records
Facility provides Adolescent reproductive & sexual health services as per guideline
Facility has defined & establish procedure for Diagnostic Services
Facility has defined & implemented procedures for Drug administration and standard treatment guideline as mandated by Government
Facility has established procedure for care of New born & Child as per guideline
The facility has establish procedure for Maternal health care as per guideline
Facility has establish procedure for Family Planning as per Govt guideline
Facility has defined & establish procedure for segregation, collection, treatment & disposal of Bio medical & hazardous waste
Facility ensures availability of Personal Protective equipment & follows standard precautions.
Facility has defined & implemented procedure for ensuring Hand hygiene practices & asepsis
Facility has standard procedure for disinfection &sterilization of equipment & instrument
Facility has established quality Assurance Program as per state/National guidelines
Facility has established system for Patients and employees satisfaction
Facility has established ,documented &implemented standard operating procedure system for its all key processes .
The facility measures its productivity, efficiency, clinical care & service Quality indicators
Facility endeavours to improve its performance to meet bench marks
Use of standards materials and Equipment for Cleaning
Cleanliness of Ambulatory Area (OPD, Emergency, Lab)
Equipment and Supplies for Bio Medical Waste Management
Segregated Collection and Transportation of Biomedical Waste
Training and Capacity Building and Standardization
